articles.author: Lorenz S. Marasigan
articles.title: PHL govt working 'double time' to save seafarers' jobs | Lorenz S. Marasigan - BusinessMirror
articles.description: THE Department of Transportation (DOTr) said on Sunday the government is “working double time to save the jobs of 49,000 Filipino seafarers aboard European ships and the $7 billion they send home each year,” as it awaits the European Commission’s (EC) “impend…
